title: Miracle on 34th Street
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.

title: Out of the Past
description: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him.

title: Gentleman's Agreement
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.

title: The Lady from Shanghai
description: Fascinated by a gorgeous woman, a seaman becomes a pawn in a complex murder plot.

title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
description: A young widow forms a unique relationship with the ghost of a seaman and writes a best seller based on his experiences.

title: Black Narcissus
description: A group of nuns struggle to establish a convent in the Himalayas, while isolation, extreme weather, altitude, and culture clashes all conspire to drive the well-intentioned missionaries mad.

title: The Bishop's Wife
description: A debonair angel comes to Earth to help an Episcopalian bishop and his wife in their quest to raise money for the new church.

title: Monsieur Verdoux
description: A suave but cynical man supports his family by marrying and murdering rich women for their money, but the job has some occupational hazards.

title: Crossfire
description: A man is murdered, apparently by one of a group of soldiers who had just left the bar. Police investigate, cutting through the soldiers' alibis.

title: Dark Passage
description: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to prove his innocence.

title: Kiss of Death
description: An ex-con tries to go straight, but a psychotic mobster stalks him and his family.

title: Nightmare Alley
description: The rise and fall of a manipulative carnival mentalist whose ambition leads him to con a wealthy industrialist.

title: Body and Soul
description: An ambitious young boxer fights his way to the top of the heap but finds he has lost his humanity along the way.

title: Brute Force
description: Tough, bitter prisoners in a crowded jail are pushed to the breaking point by a sadistic, power-hungry captain of the guards.

title: Odd Man Out
description: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police in Belfast after a failed robbery.

title: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
description: A high school girl falls for a playboy artist who is brought before a judge - her older sister.

title: Life with Father
description: A strait-laced turn-of-the-century father presides over a family of boys and the mother who really rules the roost.

title: A Double Life
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: An actor whose mind is affected by the characters he plays commits murder while playing Othello.

title: The Farmer's Daughter
description: A Swedish-American farm girl goes to the city, finds work as a maid in a Congressman's home, and eventually runs for Congress herself.

title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
description: A timid daydreamer gets mixed up in a real-life spy drama while imagining himself as a hero in various scenarios.

title: Forever Amber
description: In 17th-century England, Amber St. Clare uses her wits and beauty to climb the social ladder, but she cannot have the one man she truly loves.

title: Angel and the Badman
description: A wounded gunfighter is nursed back to health by a Quaker girl and her family, and his way of life is influenced by their peaceful nature.

title: Dead Reckoning
description: A paratrooper captain investigates the disappearance of his comrade and falls for a femme fatale with a dark past.

title: Ride the Pink Horse
description: A blackmailer goes to a small New Mexico border town during fiesta to confront a gangster who killed his friend.

title: T-Men
description: U.S. Treasury agents infiltrate a counterfeiting ring, putting their lives on the line to bust the operation.

title: Born to Kill
description: A calculating divorcee risks her chances at wealth and security with a man she suspects is a murderer.

title: The Paradine Case
description: A happily married London barrister falls in love with the accused poisoner he is defending.

title: Road to Rio
description: Two stowaways on a ship to Brazil have to rescue a woman who has been hypnotized into a marriage plot.

title: Captain from Castile
description: A young Spanish officer flees the Inquisition and joins Cortez's expedition to the New World.

title: Green Dolphin Street
description: Two sisters compete for the same man, who accidentally proposes to the wrong one due to a slip of the pen.

title: Possessed
description: A woman's obsession with her former lover leads her down a dark path of mental instability and tragedy.

title: The Egg and I
description: A city couple moves to a dilapidated farm to start a new life raising chickens, but they struggle with the challenges of rural living.

title: Boomerang!
description: A prosecutor is convinced of the innocence of a man accused of murdering a priest, despite public pressure to convict.

title: The Fugitive
description: A revolutionary priest flees to a country where religion is outlawed, pursued by a lieutenant determined to eradicate the church.

title: Pursued
description: A cowboy is haunted by repressed childhood memories and a family feud that threatens his life and happiness.

title: Mourning Becomes Electra
description: After the Civil War, a New England family is torn apart by adultery, murder, and revenge.

title: Good News
description: A college football hero falls for a studious girl after she agrees to help him pass his classes so he can play in the big game.

title: It Happened on 5th Avenue
description: Two homeless men move into a mansion while the owners are away for the winter, and they are soon joined by the owner's daughter.

title: Brighton Rock
description: A ruthless teenage gangster commits murder and marries a witness to keep her quiet, but his downfall is inevitable.

title: Quai des Orfèvres
description: A singer and her jealous husband become suspects in the murder of a lecherous film producer.

title: Lured
description: An American taxi dancer in London acts as bait for Scotland Yard to catch a serial killer who finds victims through personal ads.

title: Lady in the Lake
description: Detective Philip Marlowe is hired to find a missing woman, but the case turns into a murder investigation seen entirely from his perspective.

title: Unconquered
description: A story of love and war in pre-revolutionary America, as settlers and soldiers face Native American uprisings.

title: Daisy Kenyon
description: A commercial artist is caught in a love triangle between a married lawyer and a war veteran.

title: Desert Fury
description: A rebellious daughter returns to her casino-owner mother's Nevada town and falls for a racketeer with a dark past.

title: Down to Earth
description: The muse Terpsichore comes down to Earth to help a Broadway producer stage a play about the Greek muses.

title: Golden Earrings
description: A British spy in Nazi Germany is helped by a gypsy woman to escape and complete his mission.

title: The Macomber Affair
description: A wealthy American husband, his wife, and a professional hunter go on a safari in Africa, where tensions rise and lead to tragedy.

title: Framed
description: An unemployed mining engineer is targeted by a femme fatale for a frame-up involving embezzlement and murder.

title: The Long Night
description: A returning veteran kills a man and barricades himself in his apartment, recalling the events that led to the shooting.
